creator: jian.cai@sun.com
text:
Servlet Spec SRV 9.6 states:

"any request to access the resources in META-INF directory must be returned 
with a SC_FORBIDDEN(403) response"

The current tomcat container returns a 404 (Resource not found) error.

I talked to the spec lead and the spec will be changed that a 404 will be 
required for WEB-INF and META-INF directories.  I have reverted the fix.
creator: amyroh@apache.org
